item.title: wechat-bot
item.description: As wechat is my main social instant message communication tool, I’ve used it every day hundreds of times. Let’s develop something funny for wechat. Prerequisite: 1. Python 3+ 2. Python-virtualenv 3. Python-pip There is already one famous python framework for wechat web login named ‘itchat’, it provides automatic auth and easy event handler registration. The abc abstract metaclass is introduced to develop an abstract base template for customized filters. from
